r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace the Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation
r.n: - Add example numbering - Improved support for modifiers in fieldsynopsis - Remove () from refname when looking for version info (reported by Paul Reinheimer) - Print notes inline with its title (reported by Philip Olson) - Check if we have an open "{" before we print "}" - Escape the version info (patch by Richard Q.) - Fixed variablelist titles - Fixed table info titles - Fixed empty table cells (reported by Mark Wiesemann) - Fixed table title markup (reported by Richard Q.) - Fixed non-closing b element for empty <title />s (reported by Joshua Thompson and Philip Olson) - Fixed bug#43013 (Description rather then function name for right arrows on extension pages) (patch by Richard Q.) - Fixed bug#42906 (docs.php.net bold instead of links) - Fixed bug#42860 (cannot render <orgname> element) - Fixed bug#42845 (Copyright page has no TOC) - Language support (for autogenerated texts): * Bulgarian (by Kouber Saparev) * Czech (by Jakub Vrana) * German (by Oliver Albers) * Italian (by Marco Cucinato) * Japanese (by TAKAGI Masahiro) * Polish (by Jaroslaw Glowacki) * Brazilian Portuguese (by Diego Feitosa) * Romanian (by Simion Onea)
